entry.title: Re They call the game Immortal because it's Chess with some twists. Players can select to play with up to 4 NFT pieces that have special quests. E.g "...
entry.summary: Re They call the game Immortal because it's Chess with some twists. Players can select to play with up to 4 NFT pieces that have special quests. E.g "Queen must capture at least 3 pieces" earns you extra points (in future tokens) if you do manage to capture 3 pieces..
